nycTheatreExcerpt: Cordoba, with her sweet, expressive face, is the kind of ingenue who's easy to root for, and builds easy rapport with her family, chosen and biological. The musical trusts her to deliver, and she more than heartily rises to that challenge. Thankfully, despite some tonal flaws, so do these women.
